name: PriPara: All Idol Perfect Stage
summary: Idol Time PriPara revolves the story of Yui who lives in a town called Paparajuku. Her ultimate dream is to become an idol. However, such dream also made her realize that it is quite impossible for her to achieve. Then suddenly, the PriPara idol theme park will open in her town. And together with this, Yui’s idol, Laala, will also be there. This made Yui’s dream of becoming an idol even bigger. Unfortunately, due to some changes to the concepts and some system error, Laala is longer able to go to PriPara.
